resources.string: Get More Information about Liaison Officers Click Here
I have read this terms and condition.
Please note that by login the placement you have accepted our Terms and Condition
Eligibility for Registration: Full time student of RK University, having 5.00 and above CGPA in his/her academics can only registered for Training and Placement Cell.

Caution Money Deposite: From placement registration fees, RS.5000 will be kept as a caution money deposite which will be refunded back to the registered candidates at the end of placement season, if he/she is not violating any of the rules and regulations of placement cell.
Joining Process: Once candidate get the job offer he/she has to take NOC from Training and Placement Cell and fulfill all the process from the department.

Dress Code: Students must be formally dressed (white shirt, black trousers, tie, formal shoes, well-groomed and black blazer (during winter)) whenever they participated in any sort of interaction with a company. This office reserves the right to refuse permission to a student to attend the selection process if their attire is unsatisfactory.
Identity Cards: Students must bring their identity cards with them whenever they go through a placement process.
